snippet.title: Convento Crowdfunding Campaign Announcement Trailer #indiegogo
snippet.description:
Convento's crowdfunding campaign is now live on Indiegogo! Help us make it the best game it can be by becoming a backer at:
https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/convento-game#/

Try our free demo at itch.io: https://convento-game.itch.io/convento

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2816590/Convento/


Convento is a linear visual novel about growing up online and dealing with real life updates. A look back at the past 2 decades of gaming that will make you think about the good, the bad, and the ones left behind.

The story follows a group of players on a massive multiplayer game called Convento. An online ecosystem of players grinding for gear, cosmetics and currency, with a huge trading scene. Our characters dream of making it big, trading and selling their in-game currency for real money so they can live as comfy neets in the real world.


In a way, Convento is a love letter not just to videogames, but to the gaming community as a whole. Greatly inspired by our own experience and knowledge in games such as WoW, TF2, GMOD, among others.

#ConventoGame
